page.title: 06MISSON FEEDS AND STORAGE
page.content: As you come into Misson there is a big building called Misson Feeds and Storage but most people call it the Crop Dryers. Misson feeds and Storage have 25 employees. They took over in 1981 but the building has been standing much longer. On average Misson Feeds have 20 lorries coming in carrying grain each day from the local farms. Then some tests are done and the grain is dried until it is needed elsewhere. Two members of my family work there, my dad and my sister.My dad drives a fork lift truck and my sister tests the grain for the temperature and to see if there are any creepy crawlies in it.
